Slimebound:SlimyTonguePotion.NAME: Slimy Elixir
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever an effect applies Goop, apply #b

Slimebound:SpawnSlimePotion.NAME: Army in a Bottle
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain Slime Slots until you have 3. NL Spawn a Leeching, Mire, and Acid slime. They do not cost HP.
Gain Slime Slots until you have 6. NL Spawn 2 Leeching, 2 Mire, and 2 Acid slimes. They do not cost HP.
